text:
Raul Veloso del Mar (March 20, 1941 – November 16, 2020) was a Filipino Liberal politician and lawyer. He was a member of the House of Representatives from 1987 to 1988, then 2001 to 2010 and again from 2012 until his death. He was also the Deputy Speaker of the House from 2004 to 2010. He was born in Cebu City.
Del Mar died on November 16, 2020 in Manila at the age of 79.
